reviewDesc: Great singers/actors make eating , and even waiting for the food, a lot of fun. Found the place in 2008 - and it is still active and even better, a great sign!
title: Food and Fun

reviewDesc: Great place if you love a lively meal and don't want to talk. Cool to hear up and coming new artists singing as they work there way on to Broadway. We heard a few hits from Les Miserables and other shows they were very good! Meal is quite rushed but great to experience an American diner so pretty much burgers...
title: Lively busy with atmosphere

reviewDesc: We weren't sure what yo expect, but as we were looking for a brunch place, we walked by Ellen's and the line was wrapped around the building. We stopped and asked some folks in the live about the food and were told the food was good, but the dinging staff was the main attraction
title: Unique Experience

reviewDesc: Great singers/actors make eating , and even waiting for the food, a lot of fun. Found the place in 2008 - and it is still active and even better, a great sign!
title: Food and Fun

reviewDesc: Average American dinner on broadway where the waiters sings on the tables. It was a nice experience but for one time only. This is a tourist oriented place, very expensive ( $ 40 for an average Hamburger with French fries ). Nevertheless some of the waiters were very good singers For one time only, don't coming back.
title: Average Tourists only
